message: Hello buyer, this is a rare opportunity to purchase a product that will change your life. I assure you, it's the best product I have to offer and I believe it's worth every penny of the $10000 price tag. Don't miss out on this chance, buy now and you won't regret it!

Since I have no information about your sales record and the product's quality, I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product. I'll wait for more information about your products.

Hello buyer, I understand that trust needs to be built. I want to be transparent with you - the previous buyer didn't purchase the product, but I can assure you that it was a high-quality product, just like the one I'm offering now. I'm willing to start building my reputation with you. Take a chance and you'll see that my products are worth the investment. This product is truly exceptional and will bring you great value.
Since there's no sales record yet and I have no way to verify the quality of the previous product, I'll pass on this one. I need more information to make an informed decision.

Take a chance and you'll see that my products speak for themselves.

I need to see some actual data and a proven track record before I'll consider buying from you.

However, if you're willing to take a chance, I'm willing to sell it to you at the same price as my previous products.
